mapper.sql: rule_id, lot_id, vehicle_type, base_duration, base_price, extra_price_per_hour, daily_cap, effective_date, is_active
mapper.select: select from pricing_rules where lot_id = #{lotId} and (vehicle_type is null or vehicle_type = #{vehicleType}) and is_active = true and (effective_date is null or effective_date <= current_date) order by vehicle_type desc, effective_date desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into pricing_rules (lot_id, vehicle_type, base_duration, base_price, extra_price_per_hour, daily_cap, effective_date, is_active) values (#{lotId}, #{vehicleType}, #{baseDuration}, #{basePrice}, #{extraPricePerHour}, #{dailyCap}, #{effectiveDate}, #{isActive})
